attributes.action: Give all EU nationals residing in the UK a vote on EU membership too.
attributes.additional_details: Votes for the EU referendum were given to UK, Irish and Commonwealth citizens living in the UK. EU nationals living and working in the UK, contributing to our society and directly impacted by the results of the referendum were not allowed to take part.
attributes.background: The EU referendum should have included all EU nationals residing in the UK. Allow their vote to be incorporated in the final count. Hold a non-UK EU nationals vote.
